email_body: Expected value of game = 1/2 * 0 + 1/4 * 1 + 1/8 *2 + 1/16 *4 +1/32 * 8+.... = 0 +.25 +.25 +.25 +.25 +... = infinity "Eva Pao" <epao@mba2002.hbs.edu> on 05/13/2001 03:11:46 PM Please respond to <epao@mba2002.hbs.edu> To: <John.Arnold@enron.com> cc: Subject: waiting -----Original Message----- From: John.Arnold@enron.com Sent: Sunday, May 13, 2001 4:37 PM To: epao@mba2002.hbs.edu Subject: Re: Extra credit rules to a game: You flip a coin. If you get tails you win 0. if you get heads, i give you $1. Keep flipping until you get a tails, at which point you walk away with the money. however, each heads you get after the first you double your money. So if you flip heads 3 times and then tails, you get $4. What's you bid/offer on playing this game? (would you pay $.5 to play? $1? $2? what you charge me play against you?)
